item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, my name is Johannes. I created this page as a personal portfolio and to showcase some of my photography and other projects. I take inspiration from streets, landscapes, people, the sky, or anything that has beautiful shapes or colors. Working professionally as Engineering Manager for an international software company I spend my available time as a curious programmer of open source software, enthusiastic photographer and I especially enjoy being outdoors climbing rocks as well as taking pictures of other people climbing.

item.title: Photography
item.description: This is some selected photography in several albums: Climbing Clouds Streets

item.title: Climbing and Bouldering
item.description: This gallery contains pictures of people climbing and bouldering. The featured places are Frankenjura, Ticino, Silvretta, Allg√§u and others. Enjoy!

item.title: Clouds
item.description: This album is featuring some of my favorite photos of clouds and skies.

item.title: Streets
item.description: This album contains street photography from around the world, pictures showing houses, streets or other urban things.
